field.label: Sync remote templates by cron
field.comment:
Synchronize remote templates from dropbox by cron (suggested for large number of templates on stored remotely).
Be sure to have "pbTemplateImport" on your env.php consumer list (See module documentation).
Remember to update and save this config before new credentials creation.

field.label: Dropbox repositories
field.comment:
Add valid App key/App secret/App refresh token credentials provided from the Dropbox owner.
If you're the owner of the dropbox account you can generate the refresh token directly from the "Refresh Token Generator" section.
To generate a refresh token click on "Generate and authorize refresh token", print the access token on the input and save the config.
Refresh Token for the dropbox app will be generated automatically.
